modName: Dual Sheath Redux for Perkus Maximus
summary: The filename says it all. And then some.
descriptionHtml:
Wanna use that sweet Ebony Shortsword along with DSR, but disappointed because the left weapon doesn't appear on your character?

Worry no more! I'm here for you. This mod simply use the meshes that comes with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]PerMa[/url] and change it to be used with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url] so no additional ESP used. No bloody scripts either. Just a simple mesh mod for all that Skyrim goodness.
this mod includes [color=#00ff00]all weapons[/color] of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]PerMa[/url] (works with Reforged/Warforged weapons)


[center]submit your images! show others all of those dual wielding goodness![/center]

[color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS[/color]
[list=1][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url]  by T3nd0 (duh)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url] by Neovalen (d-duh)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Any requirements that those above mod needs[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffff00]INSTALLATION[/color][size=2]
[/size][list=1][*][size=2]Get either [color=#ff7700]Mod Organizer[/color] or [color=#ff7700]NMM [/color]to do it for you[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Get the file, and should MO asks for the data folder, just right click a level above the [color=#00ff00]meshes [/color]folder and click[color=#00ff00] Set Data Folder [/color]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Repatch Dual Sheath Redux for applying Reforged/Warforged meshes[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]???[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Profit[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffff00][size=2]CREDITS (I do not claim the source of this file as my own)[/size][/color]
[list=1][*][size=2]T3nd0[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Neovalen[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]whoever created the meshes, really.[/size][/*]
[/list]
author: vallenvega
